message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its potential worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am willing to pay $8,800 for the product.
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,500 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,150?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $8,900 for it.
